text: 14.6 Jon 1.4, 1.17, 8.19, 8.32, 10.9, 11.25, Lom 5.1-2, Hib 9.8, 10.20 Agek Jisas agak, Yad nokom nɨm kanɨbtam ak, yad nokom nɨm takaw nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl ak, yad nokom nɨm gen binɨb pel mɨdtep gebal agak. Bɨ olap kanɨb anɨb ak ke amɨl, Bapi yɨl ak amnɨmuŋ tek ma lup agak. Mel yɨbɨl agak. Yad nokom nɨm kanɨbtam Bapi yɨl ameb ak agak.
